title: The Great Northeast Cheese Fest
desc: The inaugural?  takes place   at Flushing Town Hall. More than 30 of the region?s artisanal creameries, including   will be there showcasing a diverse selection of exquisite artisanal cheeses from nutty sheep's milk tommes and sharp Cheddars to luscious triple cremes and tangy goat cheeses along with the finest wines and spirits.? ? Top New York City chefs, including   of   will? prepare delectable dishes using the cheeses. Horowitz will be joined by Michelin-starred chef?  and other top chefs. Desserts will be prepared by  ? Renowned cheese expert and ma?tre fromager   will be on hand to educate the public and debut his cheese and wine pairing app. Max will also have books for sale at the event. In addition there will demos and workshops including a primer on how to prepare the perfect cheese plate just in time for the holidays. ? All-inclusive $60 tickets entitle guests to unlimited cheese sampling and beverage pairings plus tastings from the chefs. ? Additionally, there will be a limited amount of first-come, first-serve $150 VIP tickets sold, which will allow exclusive access to special earlier culinary demonstrations and discussions about cheeses from acclaimed cheese writer and ma?tre fromager Max McCalman. Mixologists will create hand-crafted cocktails and a sommelier will be pouring top-rated wines to pair with exquisite cheeses. VIP guests will also have early access to the rest of the festival.
